InputNameConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference, including timestamp format and delimiter.

properties.name: ComponentTimestampDelimiter
properties.description: Indicates the delimiter character used between items in the data.

type.description: Indicates the delimiter character used between items in the data.

properties.name: TimestampFormat
properties.description: The format of the timestamp, whether Epoch time, or standard, with or without hyphens (-).

type.description: The format of the timestamp, whether Epoch time, or standard, with or without hyphens (-).

S3InputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference, including input data S3 location.

S3OutputConfiguration.description: Specifies configuration information for the output results from the inference, including output S3 location.

Tag.description: A tag is a key-value pair that can be added to a resource as metadata.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for the specified tag.

type.description: The key for the specified tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the specified tag.

type.description: The value for the specified tag.

properties.name: DataDelayOffsetInMinutes
properties.description: A period of time (in minutes) by which inference on the data is delayed after the data starts.

type.description: A period of time (in minutes) by which inference on the data is delayed after the data starts.

properties.name: DataInputConfiguration
properties.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference scheduler, including delimiter, format, and dataset location.

type.description: Specifies configuration information for the input data for the inference scheduler, including delimiter, format, and dataset location.

properties.name: InputTimeZoneOffset
properties.description: Indicates the difference between your time zone and Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

type.description: Indicates the difference between your time zone and Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

properties.name: DataOutputConfiguration
properties.description: Specifies configuration information for the output results for the inference scheduler, including the S3 location for the output.

type.description: Specifies configuration information for the output results for the inference scheduler, including the S3 location for the output.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: The ID number for the AWS KMS key used to encrypt the inference output.

type.description: The ID number for the AWS KMS key used to encrypt the inference output.

properties.name: DataUploadFrequency
properties.description: How often data is uploaded to the source S3 bucket for the input data.

type.description: How often data is uploaded to the source S3 bucket for the input data.

properties.name: InferenceSchedulerName
properties.description: The name of the inference scheduler being created.

type.description: The name of the inference scheduler being created.

properties.name: ModelName
properties.description: The name of the previously trained ML model being used to create the inference scheduler.

type.description: The name of the previously trained ML model being used to create the inference scheduler.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access the data source being used for the inference.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access the data source being used for the inference.

properties.name: ServerSideKmsKeyId
properties.description: Provides the identifier of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt inference scheduler data by Amazon Lookout for Equipment.

type.description: Provides the identifier of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt inference scheduler data by Amazon Lookout for Equipment.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Any tags associated with the inference scheduler.

type.description: Any tags associated with the inference scheduler.

properties.name: InferenceSchedulerArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference scheduler being created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference scheduler being created.
